p:
For the evaluation of assembly coverage, all paired-end short reads were mapped to our assembly using BWA
52 . RNA-Seq data from leaf, root, and stem tissues were assembled by Trinity
53 . HISAT2 was used to map all expressed sequence tags generated from RNA-Seq to the assembly with the default settings
54 to evaluate gene completeness. The completeness of the assembly was assessed by the CEG mapping approach (v2.5) (CEGMA)
55 and benchmarking universal single-copy ortholog (v4.0) (BUSCO) analysis
56 .
